title: Nourish 12-week Functional Medicine Nutrition Program — Balance Chestnut Hill
description: A 12-week training program with the goal of helping you nourish your body on a cellular level to reduce inflammation, shed weight, improve mood and energy, and to prevent disease. This program bridges the gap between your workouts at Balance, your practitioner's office, and your home kitchen to give
